alert.note: Alert for Deaf Smith (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 4:43PM CDT until July 13 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DEAF SMITH COUNTY... At 442 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Vega, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 440 PM CDT, trained spotters reported half dollar size hail 7 miles south southeast of Vega. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Dawn and Simms. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
